intro_description1: FinPlan is a financial app for tracking your income, expenses, and all other financial activities
intro_description2: Be smart about saving your money. With our app, you can record in detail how and where you spend your money, and with provided info you can choose how to save some of it
intro_description3: With our in built graphs, you can see how much you spend on each product and categories percentage wise
